amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $50 million and to reduce funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by a similar amount in order to address regulatory issues in coal-fired power plants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $50 million and to reduce funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 244 (Roll no. 197).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 244 (Roll no. 197).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Griffith.
